data.title: Hotels near Gare de l'Est railway station, Paris: book with all.accor.com
data.meta_description: Book your hotel near Gare de l'Est railway station, Paris: up to an extra 10% off for members of Le Club Accor
data.text:
ibis Styles Paris Cadet Lafayette

4,5 /5

941 Reviews

The ibis Styles Paris Cadet Lafayette is close to Montmartre, the Grands Boulevards and Opéra. Stroll through the nearby Moulin Rouge, Sacré-Coeur and Paris's covered passageways. Book a stay at one of our 46 rooms on a beautiful Parisian street and enjoy a friendly welcome from our team and generous complimentary breakfast. Guests can work, relax and discover our featured artists in our lobby area.

ibis Paris Opéra La Fayette 9ème

4,4 /5

1016 Reviews

The ibis Paris Opéra La Fayette hotel is ideal for tourists, families and professionals alike thanks to its location in the center of Paris. The ibis Paris Opéra La Fayette is a 3-star hotel with 67 renovated and air-conditioned rooms. The hotel has free WIFI and a snack bar, and is located a 10-minute walk from department stores, the Grands Boulevards, the Folies Bergère, Opéra Garnier and the Olympia music hall.

ibis Paris Gare du Nord Chateau Landon 10th

4,2 /5

1133 Reviews

ibis Paris Gare du Nord Château-Landon is in the north of Paris, 400 m from Gare du Nord and Gare de l'Est, 2.5 km from Cité des Sciences and department stores at Opera. RER B: Charles de Gaulle airport and Stade de France + the center of Paris: Chatelet, Les Halles, Saint-Michel, Notre-Dame. The hotel has 165 air-conditioned rooms, free WiFi, private garage, bar + snacks 24/7.

Aparthotel Adagio Paris Buttes Chaumont

4,6 /5

550 Reviews

Adagio Paris Buttes Chaumont is near Parc des Buttes Chaumont and minutes from the Canal de l'Ourcq. A modern building with a small inner courtyard and 60 apartments from 2-person studios to 3-room apartments for 6 people. A typical Parisian district with many stores and amenities. For added convenience, we have a private undercover car park. The aparthotel does not have PMR apartments or A/C.

Hotel L'Échiquier Opéra Paris-MGallery

4,7 /5

1901 Reviews

The 4-star hotel L'Echiquier Opéra Paris in central Paris is near the Grands Boulevards and the Opera, hub of French culture and lifestyle with its theaters and shows. The refurbished hotel blends modernity and Art Nouveau, preserving a Belle Epoque heritage of cabinet-making, mosaic floors, and paintings. The modern rooms and suites reflect the unique style of a Parisian apartment.

Mercure Paris Opéra Garnier Hotel & Spa

4,5 /5

2360 Reviews

Lounge Bar, indoor patio, free Wifi: This Mercure hotel, in the heart of Paris, offers all the modern comforts and facilities for facilitating the organization of your business trip or family stays.

Aparthotel Adagio Paris Opera

4,2 /5

488 Reviews

The Adagio Paris Opéra is located in a very prestigious district, just a stone's throw away from the Opéra Garnier and the department stores on Boulevard Haussmann. The 4-star holiday residence offers 99 apartments, ranging from 2-person studios to 2-room apartments for 4 people, all of which are air-conditioned and fully equipped with a kitchen, bathroom, TV with international channels and WIFI. The location is ideal for seeing Paris' sights and is also a vibrant business district.

Sofitel Le Scribe Paris Opéra

4,7 /5

2461 Reviews

Fully re-invented in 2020, this 5-star Paris hotel enjoys prime position. Located on the right bank, you can get an up-close view of the Opéra Garnier, Place Vendôme & the capital's major stores. It is also less than 15 mins from the Louvre, Tuileries Garden & Grands Boulevards. Foodies can head to Scribe's restaurant, Rivage, in one of the hotel's lounges and enjoy its sunny, Mediterranean atmosphere.

Hotel Stendhal Place Vendôme Paris-MGallery

4,7 /5

731 Reviews

In a prestigious district in the heart of Paris, the hotel is very close to Place Vendôme between the Louvre, Opera, Tuileries gardens and Galeries Lafayette. The Stendhal hotel has kept its authenticity and personality by combining modern comfort and finesse. Relax in the cosy bar with fireplace to enjoy a drink, leaf through a book about Paris, admire one of the works of art, or just unwind.

Mercure Paris Montmartre Sacré-Coeur Hotel

4,4 /5

1884 Reviews

Centrally located next to Place de Clichy and its metro lines, South Pi district and its famous cabarets, the Mercure Paris Montmartre Sacré-Coeur hotel is ideal for an authentic Parisian experience. Wander the renowned artistic Montmartre and Place du Tertre to see how artists capture the true essence of Paris. Discover the Grands Magasins, Haussmann-Saint-Lazare-Opéra square and the Stade de France.

ibis Paris Montmartre Sacré-Coeur

3,9 /5

3470 Reviews

Combine work and pleasure at the ibis Paris Montmartre 18eme. Located in central Paris by the Sacre-Coeur and 219 yards from the Moulin Rouge, discover the Wojo co-working space open 24 hours. Work in a friendly setting and enjoy the adapted services: phone box, lockers, printing and snack bar. Start your days with a fresh and varied breakfast. At the end of the day, unwind with a glass of wine at the bar.

ibis Styles Paris Crimee La Villette

3,1 /5

410 Reviews

Breakfast and unlimited WIFI included in all ibis Styles Paris Crimée La Villette rates. This stylish hotel features 40 rooms that pay tribute to Rosa Parks and Martin Luther King. Near the Parc de la Villette, the Zénith stadium and the Centquatre cultur al center. The hotel is on metro line 7 (Crimée) with links to the Gare du Nord and Gare Saint-Lazare stations via the RER E and the new Rosa Parks station. The Sacré-Coeur in Montmartre and the Louvre are within easy reach on nearby public transport
